title: Mods Digest: Toxic Atmosphere - Noticias - Enlisted
description: Enlisted es un shooter MMO basado en escuadrón para PC, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4 y la PlayStation 5 en la Segunda Guerra Mundial donde actúas como líder de escuadrón de infantería, tripulación de tanque o piloto de avión. El armamento, el uniforme de los soldados, el aspecto y las capacidades de los vehículos del juego están en línea con los hechos históricos.
cleaned_text: Mods Digest: Toxic Atmosphere We continue to review the talented creators in Enlisted mods! Thanks to the mod editor in the Burning Sky update, Enlisted has become an infinitely expandable game, and now you can create a unique mission or even a new location yourself, using thousands of environment objects from all of game's campaigns. Nuclear Wasteland by G1ROSCOPE That's acidic sinister poisonous smoke and... ongoing war. That never changes, as you may know. This mod is actually a visual rework of a similar mission set in World War I, but it's really well done. Here you'll find modern battle for an unexploded ballistic missile. You're going to see the enemy way after you hear them, and that has its own charm... that's complemented by the "toxic by Bazsi37 Another way to transform incarnation of Tunisia is almost completely covered and the battles are for the remaining chunks of land. In this mode you have 5 points set in completely different corners of the huge map. Islands, the upper floors of flooded cities, oil derricks left above the water. boats that the author has located around the respawn zone will help to get to the targets, but it is worth taking care about the construction of rallying points, to avoid being left without transport at some point. The mission is best suited for huge and very long battles. Big Battle of Volokolamsk by tommyZZM A large and pretty classic battle near Moscow, the author of which we fully appreciate for the support of his creation and original solutions. Here within one mission there is both capture points and destroying objects, opening battle zones, and the battle itself is built on a seamless map of the Battle for Moscow. Proper design and good balance. Launch the Missions Every one of you can create your own mission, as well as launch any mission from the portal. Here's a quick reminder how to launch one of these multiplayer missions. - Choose a mission you like on the [Enlisted sandbox](https://enlisted-sandbox.gaijin.net/feed/all/)portal and press COPY URL on its page. - In the game, open mode selection (above the START button) and choose you only need to customize the options, and you're good to go — your server is in the list. Tell your friends to come, wait for other players to join or play by yourself.
